title: Sans serif Font? / David Lynch: Snowmen, Steidl
content:
Hello.  
Can anybody please tell me what is the name of the font at bottom of the image.  
Thank you for the help

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131123081023im_/http:/typophile.com/files/318lIqMP--L_4662._SS500_.jpg)
author: alenka

comments.content:
That’s really (too) small.  
My guess is Myriad or Frutiger.

Yes, sorry Jan. Image is to small but i cant find a biger one. I am attaching a maginfication once more if this would help. Its similar to both that you mention but  
not exactly. Maybe small cap "e" with diagonal line and "l" with line on the top wil be helpfull.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131123081023im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SS%20font_6090.jpg)

It may be [ITC Kabel](http://web.archive.org/web/20131123081023/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-kabel/), but it's too hard to see the detail.

- Mike Yanega

The reason I picked Kabel was that the 'e' seemed to have an angled crossbar. If that's true, that would rule out Interstate, which has a horizontal crossbar on the 'e'.

- Mike Yanega
